my_favourite_bni_story: A “favorite BNI story” usually means a short, memorable success story you share in your chapter — something that shows how BNI has helped you or someone else through referrals, trust, or networking. Here’s a simple structure you can use to tell yours: 1. Start with the Challenge: Briefly explain a problem you or your client faced. 2. Show the BNI Connection: Mention who in BNI helped or how the referral came to you. 3. End with the Win: Highlight the positive result (new client, solved problem, happy customer, revenue earned, etc.). Example (you can adapt for your paver block business): "One of my favorite BNI stories is when a fellow member referred me to a construction contractor who was struggling to find reliable paver block suppliers. Because of that introduction, I was able to provide them with high-quality paver blocks on time, which helped them complete their project smoothly. Today, that contractor has become one of my regular clients, all thanks to BNI." Would you like me to create a personalized “Favorite BNI Story” for you using your paver block business so you can directly use it in your meeting?
